name: mailcow
description: Mailcow is a complete mail server suite packaged with Docker. It includes Postfix, Dovecot, SOGo, and SpamAssassin, offering full email services with a modern admin UI for domain and mailbox management.
features: Complete mail server: Includes Postfix, Dovecot, SOGo webmail, and spam filtering in one Docker stack.
Domain management: Host multiple email domains with independent settings and user management.
Webmail interface: Access email through SOGo's modern webmail client with calendar and contacts.
Spam protection: Integrated SpamAssassin and Rspamd for effective spam and malware filtering.
DKIM and SPF: Automatic configuration of email authentication to improve deliverability.
Quarantine management: Review and release quarantined messages through the admin interface.
Two-factor authentication: Secure user accounts with TOTP-based 2FA for enhanced security.
API access: Automate mailbox and domain management through a comprehensive REST API.
Backup integration: Built-in backup tools for mailboxes, settings, and configuration data.
Monitoring dashboard: Track mail server health, queue status, and resource usage in real-time.
Alias management: Create email aliases and catch-all addresses for flexible mail routing.
Mobile sync: Support for ActiveSync protocol enables native mobile email client integration.
